text: Tan Sri Dr. Ir. Haji Jamaluddin bin Mohd. Jarjis (25 May 1951 â€“ 4 April 2015) was a Malaysian politician and the former Minister of Science, Technology and Innovation. He served as the Chairman of 1 Malaysia Peoples' Housing (PR1MA), and Malaysian special envoy to the United States. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Malaysian politicians Category:Ambassadors to the United States
title: Jamaluddin Jarjis
